titleStmt.title: Religion and loyalty, or, A demonstration of the power of the Christian church within it self the supremacy of sovereign powers over it, the duty of passive obedience, or non-resistance to all their commands : exemplified out of the records of the Chruch and the Empire from the beginning of Christianity to the end of the reign of Julian / by Samuel Parker.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Samuel, 1640-1688.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
